A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The difference between a Social Activist (like me\, or any other Star Wars fan) and a Social Justice Warrior (SJW) like Rian Johnson\, Kathleen Kennedy and Disney in general:

Social Activist: "Oh\, look\, there's no wheelchair ramps into that building - Let's build a ramp!"

SJW: "Let's persecute (and possibly slap in the face) the people using the stairs and make them feel bad for having legs!"

If you substitute "people having legs" with "males" or "white people" or "wealthy people" or simply "Star Wars fans"\, you get The Last Jedi.

I felt humiliated and insulted by this movie and will surely avoid watching next installments of the Star Wars franchise by Disney. And will never buy a Disney toy again.
